item.title: ECommerce With JTL and Shopware
item.description: One of my personal projects included the creation of an B2C-Concept and E-Commerce business for Str√∂ber shoes. I will cover parts of my work and how I achieved a consumer webshop in a purely B2B corporate environment.

item.title: Cellular Interaction Modelling
item.description: Inferring Cellular Interactions from single-cell RNAseq data in the Multiple Myeloma bone marrow niche. I worked on this with Stephan Tirier and Karsten Rippe

item.title: Single Cell Genomics
item.description: Resolving transcriptomes and other -omics datasets at the single cell level opened various new possibilites in the Analysis of disease and biology.
